The route values. Used to expand parameters in the route template. Optional.
The URI scheme, applied to the resulting URI.
The URI host/authority, applied to the resulting URI. See the remarks section for details about the security implications of the .
An optional URI path base. Prepended to the path in the resulting URI.
An optional URI fragment. Appended to the resulting URI.
An optional . Settings on provided object override the settings with matching names from RouteOptions.
Docs.summary: Generates an absolute URI based on the provided values.

remarks.para: The value of should be a trusted value. Relying on the value of the current request can allow untrusted input to influence the resulting URI unless the Host header has been validated. See the deployment documentation for instructions on how to properly validate the Host header in your deployment environment.

remarks.para: The value of should be a trusted value. Relying on the value of the current request can allow untrusted input to influence the resulting URI unless the Host header has been validated.
